SEARCH
Package jdbcInterfaces

Interface ClientManager

All Known Implementing Classes:
JDBCClient
public interface ClientManager
Manages persistence and retrieval operations for the Client entity in the database.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    int
    addClient(Client client)
    Inserts a new client record into the database
    int
    countClientsByDoctor(int doctorId)
    Counts the total number of clients currently assigned to a given doctor.
    Client
    getClientByUserId(int userId)
    Retrieves a client from the database using the associated user ID.
    void
    updateDoctorForClient(int clientId, int doctorId)
    Assigns or unassigns a doctor to a specific client.
    void
    updateHeightWeight(int clientId, double weight, double height)
    Updates the weight and height fields for an existing client identified by their ID.

  • Method Details

    • addClient

      int addClient(Client client)
      Inserts a new client record into the database. * @param client The Client object to add. Its ID will be updated upon successful insertion.
      Returns:
      The auto-generated ID of the newly inserted client, or -1 if the operation fails.

    • getClientByUserId

      Client getClientByUserId(int userId)
      Retrieves a client from the database using the associated user ID.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user linked to the client profile.
      Returns:
      The retrieved Client object, or null if no client is found for the given user ID.

    • updateHeightWeight

      void updateHeightWeight(int clientId, double weight, double height)
      Updates the weight and height fields for an existing client identified by their ID.
      Parameters:
      clientId - The ID of the client to update.
      weight - The new weight value (double).
      height - The new height value (double).

    • updateDoctorForClient

      void updateDoctorForClient(int clientId, int doctorId)
      Assigns or unassigns a doctor to a specific client.
      Parameters:
      clientId - The ID of the client to modify.
      doctorId - The ID of the doctor to assign. Use a value invalid input: '<'= 0 to unassign (set to NULL).

    • countClientsByDoctor

      int countClientsByDoctor(int doctorId)
      Counts the total number of clients currently assigned to a given doctor.
      Parameters:
      doctorId - The ID of the doctor whose clients are to be counted.
      Returns:
      The number of clients assigned to the doctor.
